import React from 'react' import Header from './ReusableComponents/Header' import Footer from './ReusableComponents/Footer' import Aboutbanner from '../assets/images/Cover-image-Mission-Vision-1.png' import Paper from '@mui/material/Paper'; import Grid from '@mui/material/Grid'; import { styled } from '@mui/material/styles'; import India from '../assets/images/india.jpeg' const Item = styled(Paper)(({ theme }) => ({ backgroundColor: theme.palette.mode === 'dark' ? '#ffffff' : '#ffffff', ...theme.typography.body2, // padding: theme.spacing(3), width:'50%', margin:'10px', textAlign: 'center', color: theme.palette.text.secondary, })); const AboutUs = () => { return (

We are crazy nature-centric enthusiasts, planting trees for the people, by the people

) } export default AboutUs
